sentences.en: And I spent part of my second grade year in Sweden, where my father was on sabbatical as a professor of sociology.
sentences.cn: 因为我父亲休假的缘故，我的小学二年级有一段时间是在瑞典上的，那个时候他是一名社会学教授。

sentences.en: Basic courses in sociology and psychology as well as other humanities courses give students plenty of opportunity to explore their own emotions.
sentences.cn: 社会学和心理学的基础，以及其他人文学科的课程，赋予学生大量的机会去探索其个人情感。

sentences.en: Due to this, the phenomenon also has arosen widely attention of domestic sociology scholars.
sentences.cn: 由此, “丁克”家庭也引起了学者们的关注.

sentences.en: He specializes in the sociology of education/law/the family.
sentences.cn: 他专门研究教育／法律／家庭社会学。

sentences.en: I contemplated transferring to sociology, but found that subject too difficult.
sentences.cn: 我计划转向社会学，但是发现这门学科太难了。

sentences.en: Out with every theory of human behavior, from linguistics to sociology.
sentences.cn: 从语言学、社会学的人类行为原理里解脱吧。

sentences.en: She has a degree in sociology and politics.
sentences.cn: 她拥有社会学和政治学学位。

sentences.en: The extravagant brand is strata consumer goods secondly, as far as sociology significance be concerned.
sentences.cn: 其次, 就实会学意义而言,奢侈品牌是上层的消费品.

sentences.en: The mistress hunters are mostly women and are all psychology, sociology or law graduates.
sentences.cn: “情妇猎手”大多为女性，且都是心理学、社会学或法学的毕业生。

words.tran_cn: 社会的（等于sociologic）；社会学的；针对社会问题的
社会人际学；计量社会学
反社会的人；不爱社交的人

trans.tran_en: the scientific study of societies and the behaviour of people in groups
